markdown.markdown: ::: {.column-page} This is a list of available publications generated in the projects CoolFish and CruiZE. For a short summary, please selected the 'Detailed' tab. ```{python} #| echo: false #| output: "asis" ### PUT THIS WITHIN ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" title="Short list" appearance="minimal"} import pandas as pd import warnings warnings.filterwarnings('ignore') #read .xlsx file to dataframe df = pd.read_excel('pubs/list.xlsx', sheet_name='Sheet1') df.sort_values(by=['DATE'], ascending=False, inplace=True) # df[['FORMAT', 'TITLE', 'PUBLISHER', 'AUTHOR']].to_html(index=False) ``` ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Short list ::: {.pubtable} ```{python} #| echo: false #| output: "asis" print("|Format|Author(s)|Title|Link|") print("|--|----|---------|:-:|") import string dicon = '{{< fa file-arrow-down >}}' for index, row in df.iterrows(): authors = string.capwords(row['AUTHOR']) print(f'|{row["FORMAT"]}|{authors}|{row["TITLE"]}|{dicon}') ``` ::: ## Detailed ```{python} #| echo: false #| output: "asis" i = 0 for index, row in df.iterrows(): if (i % 2) == 0: print('::: {.grid style="padding: 1rem; border-radius: 5px;"}') else: print('::: {.grid style="background-color: #eee; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 5px;"}') print('::: {.g-col-4}') if pd.isnull(row['IMG']): imgurl = 'pubs/No-Image-Placeholder.svg' docurl = row['LINK'] print(f'') else: imgurl ='pubs/' + row['IMG'] docurl = row['LINK'] print(f'') print(':::') print('::: {.g-col-8 style="self-align: start;"}') print(f'**{row["TITLE"]}**\\') print('') print(f'*By {string.capwords(row["AUTHOR"])}. Published in/by {row["PUBLISHER"]} at {row["DATE"].date()}.*') print("\n") print('::: {.main-text}') print(f'{row["DESCRIPTION"]}') print(':::') print(':::') print(':::') i += 1 ``` ::: :::
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml: ::: {.column-page} # Publications This is a list of available publications generated in the projects CoolFish and CruiZE. For a short summary, please selected the 'Detailed' tab. ```{python} #| echo: false #| output: "asis" ### PUT THIS WITHIN ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" title="Short list" appearance="minimal"} import pandas as pd import warnings warnings.filterwarnings('ignore') #read .xlsx file to dataframe df = pd.read_excel('pubs/list.xlsx', sheet_name='Sheet1') df.sort_values(by=['DATE'], ascending=False, inplace=True) # df[['FORMAT', 'TITLE', 'PUBLISHER', 'AUTHOR']].to_html(index=False) ``` ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Short list ::: {.pubtable} ```{python} #| echo: false #| output: "asis" print("|Format|Author(s)|Title|Link|") print("|--|----|---------|:-:|") import string dicon = '{{< fa file-arrow-down >}}' for index, row in df.iterrows(): authors = string.capwords(row['AUTHOR']) print(f'|{row["FORMAT"]}|{authors}|{row["TITLE"]}|{dicon}') ``` ::: ## Detailed ```{python} #| echo: false #| output: "asis" i = 0 for index, row in df.iterrows(): if (i % 2) == 0: print('::: {.grid style="padding: 1rem; border-radius: 5px;"}') else: print('::: {.grid style="background-color: #eee; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 5px;"}') print('::: {.g-col-4}') if pd.isnull(row['IMG']): imgurl = 'pubs/No-Image-Placeholder.svg' docurl = row['LINK'] print(f'') else: imgurl ='pubs/' + row['IMG'] docurl = row['LINK'] print(f'') print(':::') print('::: {.g-col-8 style="self-align: start;"}') print(f'**{row["TITLE"]}**\\') print('') print(f'*By {string.capwords(row["AUTHOR"])}. Published in/by {row["PUBLISHER"]} at {row["DATE"].date()}.*') print("\n") print('::: {.main-text}') print(f'{row["DESCRIPTION"]}') print(':::') print(':::') print(':::') i += 1 ``` ::: :::
